conjugations.sentence_en_1: I am making fun of him.
conjugations.sentence_en_2: I don't care about the price.

conjugations.sentence_en_1: Are you making fun of me? (Are you kidding?)

conjugations.sentence_en_1: I was laughing at my fears.

conjugations.sentence_fr_1: Je me suis moqué de lui.
Nous nous sommes moqués de la situation.
Ils se sont moqués des lois.

definitions: to be dying for (figurative - mourir d'envie)

conjugations.sentence_fr_1: Tout ce qui vit doit mourir.

conjugations.sentence_en_1: You are dying to say it.

conjugations.sentence_en_2: I am swimming in these pants (too big).

definitions: to arise / to come into being
